inputs.selection_motivation: Atlantic hurricane risk disrupts supply chains, driving commodity prices up and feeding higher US inflation, which in turn exerts upward pressure on UST yields.
inputs.candidate_motivation: The source topic concerns hurricane‑related risk impacting the UST 10y, so the most relevant influences are the UST 10y itself and its term‑structure peers, along with macro drivers that shape Treasury yields and market sentiment.

proposed_link.motivation: Atlantic hurricane risk disrupts supply chains, driving commodity prices up and feeding higher US inflation, which in turn exerts upward pressure on UST yields.
